text:
Hello everyone,

I want to build a dashboard to have more visibility on the performance of emails saved for automation / Emails being sent from my workflows.
Need to display overall performance for the emails saved for automation, and stats per specific email sent if possible.

I would really appreciate your advice on this. Thanks !

Hello! My agency is in the process of developing a website for several companies merging into one big company. The new website is going to be hosted on HubSpot and we were wondering if there was a way to port an existing website into the new HubSpot account under a subdomain (i.e. <http://Company1.com|Company1.com> will become <http://company1.company2.com|company1.company2.com>). Would anyone be able to give us any tips?
what kind of tips are you looking for?
there are folks like <@U26BLKGE4> who have done this countless times.  so the more info about what you need the better
Hey <@U02J3EFR2MB> Iâ€™d be happy to take a look here, feel fee to shoot me a DM
